Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 98th overall pick, by Syracuse in 1979...
Injured on 8/9/1980 with a Bruised Finger, out for 2 days...
Traded from Syracuse to Wisconsin on 3/2/1984 (Going to SYR: CF L. Batts, P J. Poon. Going to WIS: P R. Najera, C C. Mayes)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1985, off Max Rameriz (PG)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1985, off Estanis Diaz (PG)...
Injured on 8/3/1988 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Manchester on 4/16/1990...
